description: Cybersecurity internship focused on strengthening internal security processes and aligning with industry standards.
responsibilities: Implemented security controls aligned with ISO 27001 and the Spanish National Security Framework (ENS).
Drafted internal security policies and continuous improvement proposals.
Collaborated on pentesting exercises and phishing simulations using GoPhish.
Designed cybersecurity awareness and training programs for employees.
Automated internal processes using low-code workflows in n8n.
Monitored security infrastructure with Wazuh and CrowdStrike, and visualized metrics using Grafana, Prometheus, and Loki.
Managed cloud environments (AWS, GCP, Azure) and CI/CD pipelines with GitLab.
Deployed services in Kubernetes clusters and maintained virtualized environments.
Handled mobile device and IT asset management using Applivery and Endpoint Central.
